hadiths.text: Abdullah b. 'Umar reported on the authority of his father (Allah be pleased with them). He said:As we proceeded in the morning along with AUbs Messenger (ﷺ) from Mina to 'Arafat, some of us prounced Talbiya, and some pronounced Takbir (Allah-o-Akbar)

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّلْبِيَةِ وَالتَّكْبِيرِ فِي الذِّهَابِ مِنْ مِنًى إِلَى عَرَفَاتٍ فِي يَوْمِ عَرَفَةَ
chapter.eng-name: The Talbiyah and the Takbir when going from Mina to 'Arafat on the day of 'Arafat
